name: Flappy Forest
description:
FLAPPY FOREST

Spread your wings and fly! Navigate your hungry little bird through the forest to collect as many seeds as possible without crashing into the ground or into the twisty vines. Survive as long as you can to see how many seeds you can collect in one run. Sounds are lower quality in web build. This game is still currently in development and I plan on adding more features to this game in the future. This is a spin off of the classic mobile game "Flappy Bird" created by Dong Nguyen. Follow me for future games and check out my collection. Feel free to donate and share your highscore in the comments. I hope you enjoy my mini game. Eat those seeds!

INSTRUCTIONS

[SPACE] / [Left Click] - Fly

CREDITS

Other Sounds: Sound Pack

UPDATE NOTES

v2.0 - In Development

Developed in Godot 3.3

MacOSx DOWNLOAD Section

IF THIS ERROR HAPPENS WHEN LOADING.

1) Allow your Mac to run the game by opening terminal and typing command: 

xattr -cr /Downloads/Flappy \Forest.app/

"Downloads" - Directory/Folder the game is inside.
"Flappy \Forest.app" - The game executable .app file.

IF THIS ERROR CONTINUES...

2) Override security and privacy settings by running terminal command: 

sudo spct1 --master-disable

3) Then navigate to:

System Preferences > Security & Privacy > Allow apps downloaded from:

4) Enable the button labeled:

"Anywhere". SCREENSHOTS FROM THE GAME
